insert.foreach: INTO TAG_ROOM_NO (ROOM_NO, TAG_NO) VALUES (#{item.roomNo},(SELECT TAG_NO FROM ROOM_TAG WHERE TAG_NAME=#{item.tagName}) )

mapper.select: SELECT rg.*, COALESCE(mrn_count.count, 0) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM ROOM_GROUP rg LEFT JOIN (SELECT ROOM_NO, COUNT(MEMBER_NO) AS count FROM MEMBER_ROOM_NO GROUP BY ROOM_NO ) mrn_count ON mrn_count.ROOM_NO= rg.ROOM_NO ORDER BY MEMBER_COUNT DESC
SELECT rt.TAG_NAME FROM TAG_ROOM_NO trn INNER JOIN ROOM_TAG rt ON rt.TAG_NO = trn.TAG_NO WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}

SELECT RG.ROOM_NO,RG.ROOM_NAME,RG.ROOM_INTRUDECE,ROOM_PERSONNEL,ROOM_MANAGER,ROOM_PWD,ROOM_IMG, LISTAGG(RT.TAG_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY RT.TAG_NAME) AS TAG_NAME FROM ROOM_GROUP RG LEFT JOIN TAG_ROOM_NO TRN ON RG.ROOM_NO = TRN.ROOM_NO LEFT JOIN ROOM_TAG RT ON TRN.TAG_NO = RT.TAG_NO WHERE RG.ROOM_NO =#{roomNo} GROUP BY RG.ROOM_NO,RG.ROOM_NAME,RG.ROOM_INTRUDECE,ROOM_PERSONNEL,ROOM_MANAGER,ROOM_PWD,ROOM_IMG

SELECT mrn.MEMBER_NO,m.MEMBER_NICKNAME,m.MEMBER_PROFILE FROM MEMBER_ROOM_NO mrn LEFT JOIN ROOM_GROUP rg ON mrn.ROOM_NO = rg.ROOM_NO LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" m ON m.MEMBER_NO = mrn.MEMBER_NO WHERE mrn.ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND mrn.MEMBER_NO != rg.ROOM_MANAGER
SELECT ROOM_MANAGER FROM ROOM_GROUP WHERE ROOM_NO =#{roomNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOM_GROUP SET ROOM_MANAGER = #{member} WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
UPDATE ROOM_GROUP SET ROOM_NAME = #{roomName}, ROOM_INTRUDECE = #{roomIntrudece}, ROOM_PERSONNEL = #{roomPersonnel}, ROOM_PWD = #{roomPwd}, ROOM_IMG = #{roomImg} WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
